claim_summary: Act 538 of 2025 appropriates a total of $330,969,878 for Department of Health operations, including regular salaries, personal services matching, maintenance and general operation, grants and aid, kidney disease program, breast care program, infectious disease control, and other items【849297760235391†L760-L781】.

source.title: Act 538 of 2025 – Department of Health Appropriation (Section 3)
